#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Mind-storming meeting (2009-05-22) =


= Goals/Wishes List =

  * What wereally need from monitoring system
  * Many different environments
  * Many, easy configurable metrics: OS, DB, Java, .NET, etc.
  * Near real-time analysis


= Points =

  * Agents: JMX, SNMP, JDBC, API(called by ex. Aspects) ...
  * Asynchronous metrics acquisition: Active MQ, ...
  * Database schema
    * Generic - potential performance problems
    * Static - potentially not flexible enough
  * Metrics presentation
    * BI, Reporting
    * OLAP
    * Data-mining
